column1: '''''Christie's 20th-Century Books and Manuscripts 6 December 2002''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's (London). Two Tolkien-related lots are included:
*Lot 26 (p. 20) - Quotes from and describes two letters to A.W. Riddle dated [[Letter to A.W. Riddle (10 January 1947)
column2: 10 January]] and [[Letter to A.W. Riddle (2 October 1947)
column3: 2 October]] [[1947]]. Two pages from the letters are reproduced in a photograph.

column1: *Lot 29 (p. 21) - Quotes from and describes a letter to [[Letter to Carole Ward
